en.title: New Update - 0.4.0-beta
en.content:
ğŸ® Welcome to %@ 0.4.0-beta!

âš ï¸ **Important Change Notice:**

This update will cause games from version 0.4.0-beta or earlier to be unable to scan. To restore functionality, please execute migrate_game_data.applescript (from any path).

In Terminal, execute:
```
osascript migrate_game_data.applescript
```

Then execute:
```
defaults delete com.su.code.SwiftCraftLauncher savedPlayers;
```

After data conversion, 0.4.0-beta will work normally to scan games.

ğŸ”’ Data Safety: Please regularly back up your Minecraft saves and launcher data
ğŸ› Bug Reports: If you encounter any issues, please report them on our GitHub repository

ğŸ™ Thank you for testing %@ and helping us improve!
en.author: Swift Craft Launcher Team

nl.content:
ğŸ® Welkom bij %@ 0.4.0-beta!

Deze update zorgt ervoor dat games van versie 0.4.0-beta of ouder niet kunnen worden gescand. Om de functionaliteit te herstellen, voer migrate_game_data.applescript uit (vanaf elk pad).

In Terminal, voer uit:
```
osascript migrate_game_data.applescript
```

Voer dan uit:
```
defaults delete com.su.code.SwiftCraftLauncher savedPlayers;
```

Na gegevensconversie zal 0.4.0-beta normaal werken om games te scannen.

ğŸ”’ Gegevensveiligheid: Maak regelmatig back-ups van je Minecraft-saves en launcher-gegevens
